SQL_Query: SELECT t0.RatingID, t1.Cocoa_Percent  FROM Ratings t0  LEFT OUTER JOIN CacaoBar t1 ON t0.cacaobarid = t1.cacaobarid

Attribute_Descr: The MIN Rating among the previous Ratings of the CacaoBar where
SQL_Query: SELECT t0.RatingID, MIN(t2.Rating) FROM Ratings t0  INNER JOIN CacaoBar t1 ON t0.cacaobarid = t1.cacaobarid  INNER JOIN Ratings t2 ON t1.cacaobarid = t2.cacaobarid AND t0.TimeStamp > t2.TimeStamp    GROUP BY t0.RatingID

Attribute_Descr: The MIN Rating among the previous Ratings of the CacaoBar where
SQL_Query: SELECT t0.RatingID, MIN(t2.Rating) FROM Ratings t0  INNER JOIN CacaoBar t1 ON t0.cacaobarid = t1.cacaobarid  INNER JOIN Ratings t2 ON t1.cacaobarid = t2.cacaobarid AND t0.TimeStamp > t2.TimeStamp    GROUP BY t0.RatingID

Attribute_Descr: The MAX Rating among the previous Ratings of the CacaoBar where
SQL_Query: SELECT t0.RatingID, MAX(t2.Rating) FROM Ratings t0  INNER JOIN CacaoBar t1 ON t0.cacaobarid = t1.cacaobarid  INNER JOIN Ratings t2 ON t1.cacaobarid = t2.cacaobarid AND t0.TimeStamp > t2.TimeStamp    GROUP BY t0.RatingID

Attribute_Descr: The AVG Rating among the previous Ratings of the CacaoBar where
SQL_Query: SELECT t0.RatingID, AVG(t2.Rating) FROM Ratings t0  INNER JOIN CacaoBar t1 ON t0.cacaobarid = t1.cacaobarid  INNER JOIN Ratings t2 ON t1.cacaobarid = t2.cacaobarid AND t0.TimeStamp > t2.TimeStamp    GROUP BY t0.RatingID

Attribute_Descr: The AVG Rating among the previous Ratings of the CacaoBar where
SQL_Query: SELECT t0.RatingID, AVG(t2.Rating) FROM Ratings t0  INNER JOIN CacaoBar t1 ON t0.cacaobarid = t1.cacaobarid  INNER JOIN Ratings t2 ON t1.cacaobarid = t2.cacaobarid AND t0.TimeStamp > t2.TimeStamp    GROUP BY t0.RatingID

Attribute_Descr: The SUM Rating among the previous Ratings of the CacaoBar where
SQL_Query: SELECT t0.RatingID, SUM(t2.Rating) FROM Ratings t0  INNER JOIN CacaoBar t1 ON t0.cacaobarid = t1.cacaobarid  INNER JOIN Ratings t2 ON t1.cacaobarid = t2.cacaobarid AND t0.TimeStamp > t2.TimeStamp    GROUP BY t0.RatingID
